casebody.data:
STONES TRAIL, LLC
v.
TOWN OF WESTON Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 18, 2017

Robert A. Fuller and Paul J. Pacifico, in support of the petition.

Thomas R. Gerarde, in opposition.

The plaintiffs petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 174 Conn.App. 715, 166 A.3d 832 (2017), is dismissed.
